Articles.Content: Is the ksp forum avalable on tapatalk?

No, it's not. I don't know the exact reason for this, but I think previous responses have mentioned that Tapatalk introduces server-side vulnerabilities and is generally not worth the trouble.

One of the previous responses was thus: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/73990-Tapatalk

Additionally, there's a brief discussion of mobile apps (tapatalk is mentioned briefly) here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68292-Kerbal-Space-Program-Forum-as-mobile-app
